languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g}... Одна из ветвей рода {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, древней и порочной расы {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. Эти твари — живой ужас для обычных людей, становящихся жертвами их рейдов, хотя бы потому, что, попав в лапы друкари, не умирают сразу, а становятся их игрушками. Как мы с тобой нуждаемся в воздухе, так они, чтобы выжить, жаждут психической энергии страданий и боли, которую они извлекают из своей добычи с величайшим мастерством".

{n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Друкари{/g}... Одна из ветвей рода {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, древней и порочной расы {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. languages.text: {n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}……他们是古老而邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}种族，是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的其中一个分支，会不断袭击普通人。对他们的受害者而言，黑暗灵族是活生生的恶魔。原因也简单，黑暗灵族并不会直接杀死那些受害者，而会把他们当做……‘玩物’。我们需要空气才能生存，而黑暗灵族需要从痛苦与折磨中产生的灵能能量才能生存。他们拥有不可思议的技术，极其擅长从俘虏身上提取痛苦能量。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}……他们是古老而邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}种族，是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的其中一个分支，会不断袭击普通人。对他们的受害者而言，黑暗灵族是活生生的恶魔。原因也简单，黑暗灵族并不会直接杀死那些受害者，而会把他们当做……‘玩物’。我们需要空气才能生存，而黑暗灵族需要从痛苦与折磨中产生的灵能能量才能生存。他们拥有不可思议的技术，极其擅长从俘虏身上提取痛苦能量。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix grimace.{/n} « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}... Ils font partie des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}, une race {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} aussi ancienne que vicieuse. Les gens ordinaires craignent ces créatures plus que tout, car ceux qu'elles capturent au cours de leurs raids ne sont pas tués sur place, mais emmenés pour devenir leurs... jouets, si l'on peut appeler cela ainsi. De la même manière que nous avons besoin d'air pour survivre, les Drukharis se nourrissent de l'énergie psychique née du tourment et de la souffrance de leurs victimes, énergie qu'ils sont passés maîtres dans l'art d'extraire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix grimace.{/n} « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}... Ils font partie des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}, une race {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} aussi ancienne que vicieuse. Les gens ordinaires craignent ces créatures plus que tout, car ceux qu'elles capturent au cours de leurs raids ne sont pas tués sur place, mais emmenés pour devenir leurs... jouets, si l'on peut appeler cela ainsi. De la même manière que nous avons besoin d'air pour survivre, les Drukharis se nourrissent de l'énergie psychique née du tourment et de la souffrance de leurs victimes, énergie qu'ils sont passés maîtres dans l'art d'extraire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se estremece.{/n} «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... Una de las ramas de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, una raza {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} antigua y despiadada. Estas criaturas son un terror para la gente normal que cae en manos de sus incursiones por un sencillo motivo: no matan a sus víctimas directamente, sino que las convierten en sus... "juguetes". Al igual que usted y yo necesitamos aire para vivir, los Drukhari necesitan la energía psíquica que nace de la tortura y el dolor, y son maestros a la hora de extraerla de sus prisioneros».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se estremece.{/n} «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... Una de las ramas de los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, una raza {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} antigua y despiadada. Estas criaturas son un terror para la gente normal que cae en manos de sus incursiones por un sencillo motivo: no matan a sus víctimas directamente, sino que las convierten en sus... "juguetes". Al igual que usted y yo necesitamos aire para vivir, los Drukhari necesitan la energía psíquica que nace de la tortura y el dolor, y son maestros a la hora de extraerla de sus prisioneros».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは苦笑する。{/n}「その{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は…{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}という、古い邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の一種族だ。その生物は、奴らの襲撃の餌食となった一般の人々にとっては生ける脅威。というのも、彼らは犠牲者をただ殺すのではなく…”遊び道具”にするからだ。我々が生きるために空気を必要とするように、デュカーリは拷問と苦しみから生まれる精神エネルギーを必要とする。奴らはそれを、虜囚から尋常ならざる手段で抽出する」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは苦笑する。{/n}「その{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}は…{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}という、古い邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の一種族だ。その生物は、奴らの襲撃の餌食となった一般の人々にとっては生ける脅威。というのも、彼らは犠牲者をただ殺すのではなく…”遊び道具”にするからだ。我々が生きるために空気を必要とするように、デュカーリは拷問と苦しみから生まれる精神エネルギーを必要とする。奴らはそれを、虜囚から尋常ならざる手段で抽出する」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} ... Einer der Zweige der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, einer uralten und brutalen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Spezies. Diese Kreaturen sind ein lebender Schrecken für gewöhnliche Leute, die Opfer ihrer Raubzüge werden. Denn ihre Opfer werden nicht sofort getötet, sondern werden zu ihren ... 'Spielzeugen'. Genau wie Ihr und ich Luft zum Überleben brauchen, brauchen die Drukhari psychische Energie, die aus Qualen und Schmerzen entsteht. Diese Energie entlocken sie ihren Gefangenen mit grauenhafter Kunstfertigkeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} ... Einer der Zweige der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, einer uralten und brutalen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Spezies. Diese Kreaturen sind ein lebender Schrecken für gewöhnliche Leute, die Opfer ihrer Raubzüge werden. Denn ihre Opfer werden nicht sofort getötet, sondern werden zu ihren ... 'Spielzeugen'. Genau wie Ihr und ich Luft zum Überleben brauchen, brauchen die Drukhari psychische Energie, die aus Qualen und Schmerzen entsteht. Diese Energie entlocken sie ihren Gefangenen mit grauenhafter Kunstfertigkeit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix irkiliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhariler{/g}... Kadim ve kudretli {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} ırkı {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari'nin{/g} alt soylarından biridir. Bu yaratıklar, baskınlarına maruz kalan sıradan halk için yaşayan birer dehşettir zira kurbanlarını öldürmekle yetinmez, onları 'oyuncakları' yaparlar. Nasıl senin ve benim yaşamak için havaya ihtiyacımız varsa Drukhariler de acı ve ızdıraptan doğan ruhsezi enerjisine ihtiyaç duyar ve bu enerjiyi tutsaklarından olağanüstü bir uzmanlıkla çıkarmasını bilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix winces.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... One of the branches of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, an ancient and vicious {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} race. Those creatures are a living terror to ordinary people who fall prey to their raids, for the simple reason that the victims are not killed outright but instead become their... 'playthings.' Just as you and I need air to survive, the Drukhari require psychic energy born from torment and pain, which they extract from their captives with uncanny expertise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix irkiliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}... Kadim ve kudretli {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} ırkı {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'nin dallarından biri. Bu yaratıklar baskınlarına maruz kalan sıradan insanlar için yaşayan birer dehşettirler çünkü kurbanlarını öldürmekle yetinmezler, onun yerine onları 'oyuncakları' yaparlar. Nasıl senin ve benim yaşamak için havaya ihtiyacımız varsa Drukhari de acı ve ızdıraptan doğan psişik enerjiye ihtiyaç duyar ve bu enerjiyi tutsaklarından olağanüstü bir uzmanlıkla çıkartmasını bilir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
